ModMetaData.name: Player Log Warning
ModMetaData.author: Vectorial1024
ModMetaData.description:
A very simple mod that warns you about oversized Player.log files. In general, if your log file is somehow larger than 100MB, then something must have gone wrong.
Now you can rest assured: you won't need to worry about an oversized Player.log eating up your disk space!
Security note: this mod will read files inside your local RimWorld config files.
